General.Name: COWINTECH Co. Ltd
General.Description: COWINTECH Co. Ltd. engages in the manufacture and installation of equipment for automation. The company offers bucket, pallet and roll type automation warehouse products; material logistic equipment, including conveyor, automatic shuttle, lifter automation warehouse, de-stacker/magazine, and environment distribution equipment; and process distribution line products, such as engine assembly line, tire tapping type wrapping machine, product thickness sorting machine, arrangement equipment and wrapping machine. It also engages in the instrumentation and control, and maintenance businesses. COWINTECH Co. Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Asan-si, South Korea.
